info.title: Smart Finances
info.description: A FastAPI application for smart finances management

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

put.description: Update the profile of the currently authenticated user. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

post.description: Create a new user with the provided data. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

delete.description: Delete the currently authenticated user. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

get.description:
Get a list of all accounts.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

post.description: Create a new account with the provided data. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

get.description:
Get a specific account by ID.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

put.description: Update an account with the provided data. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

delete.description:
Delete an account.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

get.description:
Get a specific category by ID.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

put.description:
Update a category if it belongs to the current user.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

delete.description:
Delete a category if it belongs to the current user.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

get.description:
Get a list of all categories.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

Optional query parameter:
- `type`: Filter categories by type (`income` or `expense`).

post.description:
Create a new category.

This endpoint requires authentication via JWT token.
Include the token in the Authorization header as: `Bearer <your_token>`

get.description:
Search transactions by account, category, type, currency, date range, amount range,
and source for the authenticated user.

post.description: Create a new transaction with the provided data. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

get.description: Retrieve a specific transaction owned by the current user.

put.description: Update a transaction with the provided data. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

delete.description: Delete a transaction owned by the current user.

post.description: Create a new transfer transaction with the provided data. Requires a valid JWT token in the Authorization header.

get.description: Get all transactions for a specific account.
Get all transactions for a specific category.
Get all tags for the current user

post.description: Create a new tag for the current user

put.description: Update a tag if it belongs to the current user

delete.description: Delete a tag if it belongs to the current user

HTTPBearer.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer <token>
